mapper.delete: delete from hm_erp_venue where id = #{id} and company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.update: update hm_erp_venue set base_id = #{baseId}, venue_name = #{venueName}, venue_type = #{venueType}, venue_phone = #{venuePhone}, respo = #{respo}, address = #{address}, venue_status = #{venueStatus}, company_id = #{companyId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, base_id, venue_name, venue_type, venue_phone, respo, address, venue_status, company_id from hm_erp_venue where id = #{id} and company_id = #{companyId}
select id, base_id, venue_name, venue_type, venue_phone, respo, address, venue_status, company_id from hm_erp_venue where company_id=#{companyId} and venue_type = #{venueType}
